title: We let Predictive Text make our New Year's Resolutions - KFAF
description:
Hurry to http://upstart.com/morning to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate is.

To get your 15% off your first pair, free shipping, and a 100% satisfaction guarantee, go to http://meundies.com/morning.

Get an extra $30 off any purchase of $399 or more at http://indochino.com when entering code MORNING at checkout.

Everyone at Kinda Funny lets the predictive text function on thier phones set their 2020 New Year's Resolutions

Time Stamps - 
00:00:30 - New Year’s resolutions
00:13:00 - Sink my WarBoat
00:21:20 - Upstart
00:23:20 - Meundies
00:25:44 - Indochino
00:28:20 - Photoshop Challenge
00:37:05 - Next Week’s Photoshop Challenge - Famous historical photos/paintings (Colin Davis)
00:37:38 - Ask Andy Anything

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
